altername_name: Monster Hunter XX: Double Cross Nintendo Switch Ver.
name: Monster Hunter Generations Ultimate
overview: This critically acclaimed action RPG series makes its debut on Nintendo Switch. Take on epic hunts on the go or from the comfort of your own home! Choose from 14 different weapon types, mix and match them with unique Hunting Styles and Hunter Arts, or even play as an adorable but ferocious Felyne in Prowler Mode! Featuring the largest cast of monsters for any game in the series, from returning fan favorites to mysterious never-before-seen monsters!
